s1_text: This wireless electrical muscle stimulator can relax muscles, reduce fatigue, relieve shoulder neck back pain. Enjoy scientific and healthy massages with your whole family.
s2_title: Wide Range of Parts for Body
s2_text: If you have muscle soreness from regular exercise or simply suffer from aches anywhere in your body, then this massager will help you alleviate it all!
s3_text: Connect it to your phone with wireless. Koogeek Health app offers multiple massage modes including relaxation, music play, massage , and exercise mode.
s4_text: Applies Electrical Muscle Stimulation (EMS) technology, it triggers muscle contraction by stimulating motor nerves directly through external current. Relax your whole body.
s5_text: Relaxing Occasion; Walking Occasion; Reading Occasion; Working Occasion
s6_text: Adopt 10 different levels of intensity from warm-up to high-intensity exercise, meet your diverse needs fully.
s7_text1: This EMS massager is clinically proven to be safe and effective. It does no harm to human body. Just enjoy scientific and healthy massages.
s7_text3: Please don’t use it when people who have a cardiac pacemaker, implanted defibrillator, or other implanted electronic device.
s7_text4: Please don’t use it when people who are pregnant.
s8_text: Fix the smart massager to the position where you want to relax. It will automatically shut down after 23 minutes.
s8_icon2: Press for 3 seconds to power on
s8_icon4: Press for 3 seconds to power off
s9_text: Work up to 300 minutes on a full charge with the built-in 160mAh rechargeable lithium battery.
s10_text: Pocket size and wireless connectivity prevent you from being limited in location and time.
